version_description:
Bug fixed: cross hair don't show up in recorded video;
Bug fixed: saved guns disappear after update;
+ Guns: 2 snipers; 1 SMG;
+ Parts: 2 mags; 8 hand guards; 3 muzzle flash hiders; 3 sights; 3 stocks; 1 bipod; 1 knife;
Update: mini game;

+ 2 shotguns;
+ 1 sniper;
+ 3 iron sights;
+ 1 knife;
+ Gyroscope bug fixed.
( To use Gyroscope, find gyroscope on Menu -> Setting -> Control, and turn it on)

lots of guns and parts added.

+ 4 LMGs and 1 rifle;
+ 8 sights;
+ 4 stocks;
+ 9 bipods;
+ flash light and grips;
Minor bug fixed.

+ New Grenade Pack.
+ 7 stocks;
+ 3 bipod;
+ 9 sights;

People who bought "unlock all" will get ALL the packs back!

Important Bug Fixed:
we found some people lost pack after last update ( V3.35). please update your game now.

1. Add new gun: XM8
2. Add mini game 2: Zombify Animals Hunter
3. Remove Camera Mode
We remove this augmented reality feature for the reason that it does not comply with one or more App Review Guidelines.
It might encourage or promote reckless behavior.

+ Anti reflection device.
+ Video Mode (no camera access).
+ Bug fixed.

1, add a shooting range background picture to Video Mode.
( you can shoot this given shooting range picture only. no camera access.)

2. add 9 new levels to zombie game 2.

+ upgrade scope system.
+ new guns: 4 rifles, 2 snipers.
+ new sight: 5 scope, 1 red dot, 1 holo.
+ new stock: 3 stocks.

+ 10 stocks
+ 1 bipod
+ 2 sights

Update rifle: M4, M1 Grand and
Update MOE handguards

New gun & parts:
+ 4 stocks
+ M1 Carbine

+ Eyes focus simulation
hero’s eyes can automatically focus sharply on an enemy at a specific distance; objects nearer or farther from the hero will be somewhat out of focus
+ Attachable secondary weapons can be fire.
+ Game 1, Game 2 and Shooting Range support grenade launcher weapon class.
+ Improve UI graphic.
+ Optimise gameplay.

Animator Update:
1. make shotgun supports reload animation.
2. add more reload animation content.
3. improve existing reload animation content.
4. improve Pistol recoil animation.

Bug fixed.

1, UI enhancement.
2, Make it available for sniper scopes to go on the M4/M16, ACR rifles
3, Make it available for G36 & FAMAS sights to go on ACR rifles.
4, Update URX (Medium) handguard.

+ Recoil system major enhancement.
realistic recoil will also alter player’s angle while shooting (not just the gun shaking)
+ Swap button in the games.
you can swap your guns in all the game levels and shooting range scene.
+ 1 shotgun stock.
+ Fixed shotgun shooting bug.

1, Major graphic enhancement
for all the guns & parts.
2, Update painter:
pistol grip and mag will not be painted by painter.
improve paint effect.
3, Add parts:
+ 2 mags, 2 stocks, 1 hand guards
4, Update 4 hand guards: M16 VN, MOE, SA80-L85A2, SA80-L86LSW,

1, Zombie survival game is updated.
2, Air soft gun supported:
Now you can make an air soft gun by customise : Muzzle Flash, Shooting Sound, Ammunition
3, New sound effects.

4, New CAMO effects and CAMO graphic enhancement.

1, Survival game major enhancement.
2, + Sprint button to all the games
( to replace virtual joystick)
3, + Sprint animation for all your guns.
4, Bug fixed: the hand glitch that appears beside some weapons.

+ Zombies: 2 spiders in Survival Game.
+ Shotgun: Jackhammer.
+ Sniper: WA2000.
Bugs fixed.

Improve performance.
Support iOS 11

Improve the explosion effects.
Improve gun recoil effect.
Fixed photo painter frame no show up;
Fixed swapping sniper causing no longer 1 hit kill.
Fixed VBR pistol not causing damage in hit fire.
Removed multiplay game mode.
Add a brand new game mode: Game 2018

added new levels in Game 2018.
improved the control system.

+ The old shooting range (Fruit Shooter) is back, with some newly added targets (Crock) to shoot.
+ New levels for game 2018.
Important bugs fixed.

+ Sound Effects: 5 new shooting sounds.
+ Melee Supported: finally you can use melee in games and shooting range.
+ Balloons in shooting range.
+ Control setting in [Game Survival] and [Shooting Range].

Important !
This update make the game run perfectly on all the devices.

1, Fixed UI issues on iPad Pro, iPhone XR, iPhone XMax.
2, Optimize for the following devices: iPhoneXS, iPhone XR, iPhone XMax, iPad Pro
Important bugs fixed.
